pages.text: The Zombie Talisman boosts attack speed for 3 hits after not attacking for 5 seconds.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_advanced)Advanced Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_rejectors)Force of Rejectors$(/l).
